thread.title: The Ford GT Competition Series Looks Like A No-Frills Ferrari Killer
thread.title_full: The Ford GT Competition Series Looks Like A No-Frills Ferrari Killer

author: Freddy "Tavarish" Hernandez
title: The Ford GT Competition Series Looks Like A No-Frills Ferrari Killer
text:
Go to permalink All images by Ford 
Ford just released pictures of their new Ford GT Competition Series, a lightweight, track-focused version of their already bonkers supercar, and it looks every bit as purposeful and menacing as it should to sway the minds and wallets of the fickle supercar buying public. Advertisement 
The Competition Series is Ford GT’s answer to boutique track-day versions of popular supercars such as the Porsche 911 GT3 RS and Lamborghini Huracan Performante. 
The GT Competition Series features air conditioning and radio deletes, bare carbon in the door sills, dashboard and exterior stripes, carbon fiber wheels with matching titanium lug nuts, and titanium exhaust tips. You can read the more complete list of specs here. The Ford GT Competition Series Dumps The Weight To Terrify Every 911 GT3 RS Owner The Ford GT Competition Series Dumps The Weight To Terrify Every 911 GT3 RS Owner The Ford GT Competition Series Dumps The Weight… The new Ford GT, America’s most anticipated new supercar, has just become a contender in the… Read more Read more 
For now, feel free to ogle the pictures that will get you up close to a car most of us will never see, but will likely be on the bedroom walls of kids across the world for years. Dan Gurney Would Be Proud
